sourcesContent:
<script setup>
import axios from 'axios'

const makeRequest = () => {
  const url = 'api0/oauth/2.0/token'
  const data = {
    client_id: 'hQECB6a2zwIgBb6qb7geKhvR',
    client_secret: 'xAmNLcLqR6jemYhnLGGHKw3C5VZjG1G4',
    grant_type: 'client_credentials'
  };
  const config = {
    params: data
  }
  axios.post(url, data, config).then(response => {
    console.log(response.data)
  })
}
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="makeRequest">Make Request</button>
</template>
